StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc2083
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId uniqueiden..er, @SSN char(11), @FirstName varchar(75), @LastName varchar(75), @MaidenName varchar(75), @MiddleName varchar(50), @Su.x char(10), @PackageId uniqueiden..er, @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er, @BirthDate date.me, @Gender .nyint, @Height smallint, @Weight smallint, @CurrentResidenceIsHOR bit, @RaceCode .nyint, @EthnicCode .nyint, @PayGradeCode char(2) = null, @RankCode char(5) = null, @PriorService .nyint = null, @PriorServiceDays int = null, @MaritalStatus char(1) = null, @ReligiousPref varchar(50), @FathersFullName varchar(150) = null, @MothersFullName varchar(150) = null, @Program .nyint, @SourceOfEntry .nyint, @ContractDate date.me, @ProjectedGradua.onDate date.me, @ProjectedCommissionDate date.me, @OCSComple.onDate date.me, @NumberOfDependents int ) AS
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF @Program IS NULL OR @Program = 0 BEGIN DECLARE @McrissPersonId int
SELECT @McrissPersonId = PERSON_ID FROM MCRISS.dbo.PERSON WHERE SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = REPLACE(@SSN, '-', '')
IF @McrissPersonId IS NOT NULL BEGIN DECLARE @CurrentNwaId int DECLARE @ComponentCode varchar(2)
SELECT @CurrentNwaId = MAX(NWA_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @McrissPersonId
SELECT @ComponentCode = OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @CurrentNwaId
IF @ComponentCode IN ('1C') -- OCC AIR BEGIN SET @Program = 1 -- Air END ELSE IF @ComponentCode IN ('0B', '0F', '1B', '1E') -- PLC GROUND, PLCR GROUND, OCC GROUND, OCCR GROUND BEGIN SET @Program = 2 -- Ground END ELSE IF @ComponentCode IN ('0E', '1A') --PLC LAW, OCC LAW BEGIN SET @Program = 3 -- Law END ELSE IF @ComponentCode IN ('0A', '1H') --PLC NFO, OCC NFO BEGIN SET @Program = 4 -- NFO END ELSE IF @ComponentCode IN ('0C') -- PLC NA BEGIN SET @Program = 5 -- NA END ELSE BEGIN SET @Program = 0 -- UNK END END END
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[Person] WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId) BEGIN --Update Person UPDATE [ACP].[Person] SET [SSN] = @SSN, [FirstName] = @FirstName, [LastName] = @LastName, [MaidenName] = @MaidenName, [MiddleName] = @MiddleName, [Su.x] = @Su.x WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId END ELSE BEGIN --Insert Person INSERT INTO [ACP].[Person] ([PersonId],[SSN], [FirstName], [LastName], [MaidenName], [MiddleName], [Su.x]) VALUES (@PersonId, @SSN, @FirstName, @LastName, @MaidenName, @MiddleName, @Su.x) END
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[Applicant] WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId) BEGIN --Update Applicant UPDATE [ACP].[Applicant] SET [PackageId] = @PackageId, [RecruiterId] = @RecruiterId, [BirthDate] = @BirthDate, [Gender] = @Gender, [Height] = @Height, [Weight] = @Weight, [CurrentResidenceIsHOR] = @CurrentResidenceIsHOR, [RaceCode] = @RaceCode, [EthnicCode] = @EthnicCode, [PayGradeCode] = @PayGradeCode, [RankCode] = @RankCode, [PriorService] = @PriorService, [PriorServiceDays] = @PriorServiceDays, [MaritalStatus] = @MaritalStatus, [ReligiousPref] = @ReligiousPref, [FathersFullName] = @FathersFullName, [MothersFullName] = @MothersFullName, [Program] = @Program, [SourceOfEntry] = @SourceOfEntry, [ContractDate] = @ContractDate, [ProjectedGradua.onDate] = @ProjectedGradua.onDate, [ProjectedCommissionDate] = @ProjectedCommissionDate, [OCSComple.onDate] = @OCSComple.onDate, [NumberOfDependents] = @NumberOfDependents WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId END ELSE BEGIN --Insert Applicant INSERT INTO [ACP].[Applicant] ( [PersonId], [PackageId], [RecruiterId], [BirthDate], [Gender], [Height], [Weight], [CurrentResidenceIsHOR], [RaceCode], [EthnicCode], [PayGradeCode], [RankCode], [PriorService], [PriorServiceDays], [MaritalStatus], [ReligiousPref], [FathersFullName], [MothersFullName], [Program], [SourceOfEntry], [ContractDate], [ProjectedGradua.onDate], [ProjectedCommissionDate], [OCSComple.onDate], [NumberOfDependents] ) VALUES ( @PersonId, @PackageId, @RecruiterId, @BirthDate, @Gender, @Height, @Weight, @CurrentResidenceIsHOR, @RaceCode, @EthnicCode, @PayGradeCode, @RankCode, @PriorService, @PriorServiceDays, @MaritalStatus, @ReligiousPref, @FathersFullName, @MothersFullName, @Program, @SourceOfEntry, @ContractDate, @ProjectedGradua.onDate, @ProjectedCommissionDate, @OCSComple.onDate, @NumberOfDependents ) END
-- Try to get the NwaGUID --EXEC [ACP].[UpdateApplicantNwaGUID] @AcpPersonId=@PersonId, @NwaGUID=null
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully, commit the transac.on COMMIT TRANSACTION
